coreAttributes.name: Flex Tape - Vagina
coreAttributes.description: FLEX TAPE is a super strong, rubberized, waterproof tape that can patch, bond, seal and repair virtually anything, even your virginity! It is specially formulated with a thick, flexible, rubberized backing that conforms to any shape or object. This durable adhesive tape instantly seals out water, air and cum to create a super strong, flexible, watertight barrier.

displacementText.playerSelf: You very, very, VERY slowly peel the tape off your [pc.vagina+] and throw it away.
displacementText.playerNPC: You very, very slowly peel the tape off [npc.name]'s [npc.vagina+] and throw it away.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You pinch a corner of the tape, giving it a few frustrated tugs, before using your magic to split it down the middle. [npc.Name] can remove the rest [npc.herHim]self later. Not your problem.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] very, very, VERY slowly peels the tape off [npc.her] [npc.vagina+] and throws it away. It takes a lot of effort.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] very, very slowly peels the tape off your [pc.vagina+] and throws it away. It takes a lot of effort.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] pinches a corner of the tape, giving it a few frustrated tugs, before managing to tear it off, leaving your [pc.vagina+] red and sore. That's a lotta damage!
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] very, very slowly peels the tape off [npc2.name]'s [npc2.vagina+] and throws is away. It takes a lot of effort.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] pinches a corner of the tape, giving it a few frustrated tugs, before managing to tear it off, leaving [npc2.name]'s [pc.vagina+] red and sore. That's a lotta damage!

replacementText.playerSelf: #IF (!pc.isVaginaVirgin()) #THEN #IF (pc.setVaginaVirgin(1)!=null) #THEN You place a few strips of Flex Tape over your [pc.vagina+], giving it a few pats to stick it in place. #ELSE You place a few strips of Flex Tape over your [pc.vagina+], giving it a few pats to stick it in place. #ENDIF #ELSE You place a few strips of Flex Tape over your [pc.vagina+], giving it a few pats to stick it in place. #ENDIF
replacementText.playerNPC: #IF (!npc.isVaginaVirgin()) #THEN #IF (npc.setVaginaVirgin(1)!=null) #THEN You place a few strips of Flex Tape over [npc.name]'s [npc.vagina+], giving it a few pats to stick it in place. #ELSE You place a few strips of Flex Tape over [npc.name]'s [npc.vagina+], giving it a few pats to stick it in place. #ENDIF #ELSE You place a few strips of Flex Tape over [npc.name]'s [npc.vagina+], giving it a few pats to stick it in place. #ENDIF
replacementText.playerNPCRough: #IF (!npc.isVaginaVirgin()) #THEN #IF (npc.setVaginaVirgin(1)!=null) #THEN You hold [npc.name]'s [npc.legs+] apart, keeping them spread with your elbows as you slap the Flex Tape over [npc.her] [npc.vagina+]. #ELSE You hold [npc.name]'s [npc.legs+] apart, keeping them spread with your elbows as you slap the Flex Tape over [npc.her] [npc.vagina+]. #ENDIF #ELSE You hold [npc.name]'s [npc.legs+] apart, keeping them spread with your elbows as you slap the Flex Tape over [npc.her] [npc.vagina+]. #ENDIF
replacementText.NPCSelf: #IF (!npc.isVaginaVirgin()) #THEN #IF (npc.setVaginaVirgin(1)!=null) #THEN [npc.Name] places a few strips of Flex Tape over [npc.her] [npc.vagina+], and gives it a few pats to stick it in place. #ELSE [npc.Name] places a few strips of Flex Tape over [npc.her] [npc.vagina+], and gives it a few pats to stick it in place. #ENDIF #ELSE [npc.Name] places a few strips of Flex Tape over [npc.her] [npc.vagina+], and gives it a few pats to stick it in place. #ENDIF
replacementText.NPCPlayer: #IF (!pc.isVaginaVirgin()) #THEN #IF (pc.setVaginaVirgin(1)!=null) #THEN [npc.Name] places a few strips of Flex Tape over your [pc.vagina+], and gives it a few pats to stick it in place. #ELSE [npc.Name] places a few strips of Flex Tape over your [pc.vagina+], and gives it a few pats to stick it in place. #ENDIF #ELSE [npc.Name] places a few strips of Flex Tape over your [pc.vagina+], and gives it a few pats to stick it in place. #ENDIF
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: #IF (!pc.isVaginaVirgin()) #THEN #IF (pc.setVaginaVirgin(1)!=null) #THEN [npc.Name] holds your [pc.legs+] apart, keeping them spread with [npc.her] elbows as [npc.she] slaps the Flex Tape over your [pc.vagina+]. #ELSE [npc.Name] holds your [pc.legs+] apart, keeping them spread with [npc.her] elbows as [npc.she] slaps the Flex Tape over your [pc.vagina+]. #ENDIF #ELSE [npc.Name] holds your [pc.legs+] apart, keeping them spread with [npc.her] elbows as [npc.she] slaps the Flex Tape over your [pc.vagina+]. #ENDIF
